snippet: In Texas, where the curriculum-setting State Board of Education has had high-profile skirmishes over science education, there will be no rush to put the new standards in effect.
lead_paragraph: In Texas, where the curriculum-setting State Board of Education has had high-profile skirmishes over science education, there will be no rush to put the new standards in effect.

headline.seo: Texas Classrooms Are Unlikely to Adopt New Common Science Standards Soon
headline.main: State’s Classrooms Are Unlikely to Adopt New Common Science Standards Soon
headline.print_headline: State’s Classrooms Are Unlikely to Adopt New Common Science Standards Soon
